name: Quantum Cabaret
description:
Play through the Jazzy Noir story by changing colors in the scenes.

Get the game from GitHub or from itch (please read the installation instructions on GitHub!): https://github.com/Hegemege/quantum-jazz

Includes elements from Quantum Black Box and Quantum Piano.

Credits:
